prompt: Edit the uploaded photo — professional editorial skin retouch at magazine cover level for cosmetologist portfolio. PRESERVE: Face identity 100% identical — one-to-one likeness. No changes to facial features, proportions, age, expression. Original camera angle, crop, framing preserved. EYELASHES: Pixel-identical — no change to color, curl, density, volume, thickness, length, direction, separation. No mascara effect, no enhancement. Absolutely protected from any processing with ZERO interaction. EYEBROWS: Pixel-identical — no change to color, density, shape, tone, texture. No grooming, no filling, no makeup. Absolutely protected. LIPS: Pixel-identical — no change to color, shape, texture. No lip makeup added. HAIR: Pixel-identical — preserve all texture, position, natural shine. Unchanged. MAKEUP: Unchanged — preserve all existing makeup application. SKIN: This is the master's work — [SKIN_FINISH]. STRICT: Do not change skin color, tone, temperature, or undertone. No color grading applied to skin. No white balance shifts. Skin hue, saturation, luminance must remain identical to original. Sharp high-frequency detail preserved. [EXTRAS]. BACKGROUND: [BACKGROUND]. QUALITY: Preserve original color correction, temperature, tone. No filters added. Professional Vogue-level editorial finish. Ultra-photorealistic. Sharp focus. 8K quality. Original dimensions — do not crop or resize.

options.value: Soft luminous pearl-white gradient with subtle warm undertone — clean, glowing, airy. Faint dewy mist effect in the background creating depth. Premium skincare campaign feel — pure, fresh, radiant
Solid deep black background — dramatic high-contrast editorial
Clean solid white studio background — bright, airy, professional
Soft gradient from deep rose-gold to warm nude — luxury cosmetic brand aesthetic. Subtle bokeh light particles

Full professional editorial retouch. Remove only minor temporary blemishes (acne, redness, spots, minor discoloration). Preserve natural texture — visible pores, micro-details, vellus hair, natural freckles and moles. Even skin tone, natural luminosity, healthy glow — not oily or artificial. Hydrated editorial glow with subtle highlights on high points. Micro-contrast enhanced for realistic depth and dimension. Skin looks fresh, hydrated, radiant from within — dewy editorial finish. No plastic look, no blur, no airbrush, no waxy surface, no frequency separation artifacts, no noise reduction, no smoothing

Light professional retouch. Remove only temporary blemishes. Preserve all natural texture — pores, micro-details, vellus hair. Even skin tone, natural luminosity. No glow effects, no shine enhancement. Clean natural look. No blur, no smoothing

Professional retouch with realistic wet/dewy glass-skin effect. Fine water droplets and micro-moisture visible on skin surface. Bright highlights with realistic reflections. Wet sheen follows natural facial contours. Effect looks editorial, cinematic, luxurious. No blur, no smoothing. Preserve natural pores and texture underneath the wet layer
Add soft natural freckles across nose and cheeks — delicate, barely noticeable, photorealistic
Add rim light from behind — golden separation light on hair and shoulders for depth
Add subtle highlighter effect on cheekbone tops, nose tip, and cupid's bow — editorial luminous finish
